scripts.bump: cross-var cross-env if-env J1DOCKER=true && run-s -s bump-docker || run-s -s bump-local
scripts.setup: npm --silent run setup-start && npm --silent run setup-base && run-s -s setup-create-log-folders && run-s -s setup:*
scripts.ver: cross-var echo "Project version: $npm_package_version" && echo Package versions: && lerna ls && cd ./packages/500_template_gem && bump current | shx sed "s/Current version:/Gem version:    /"
scripts.bump-local: run-s -s ver && run-s -s bump-version:* && run-s -s ver
scripts.bump-docker: shx mv package-lock.json .package-lock.json && run-s -s ver && run-s -s bump-version:* && run-s -s ver && shx mv .package-lock.json package-lock.json
scripts.clean:start: echo Clean up project root files ..
scripts.clean:bundle-folder: echo Remove bundle folder .. && shx rm -rf .bundle
scripts.clean:log-folder: echo Remove log folder .. && shx rm -rf log
scripts.clean:log-files: echo Remove log files .. && shx rm -f *.log
scripts.clean:packages: echo Clean up project packages .. && lerna run --parallel clean
scripts.credential:set: git config credential.helper store && echo done.
scripts.reset:start: echo Reset development system to factory state ..
scripts.reset:clean: echo Remove js modules from all packages .. && lerna clean --yes
scripts.setup:node-modules: echo Bootstrap project modules .. && echo J1 Project modules: >> install.log && npm install --silent >> install.log && echo done.
scripts.setup:lerna: echo Initialize development packages .. && lerna init && lerna bootstrap && echo done.
scripts.setup:detect-os: echo Detect operating system .. && cross-var cross-env if-env OS=Windows_NT && cross-var echo "OS detected as: $OS" || OS=$(echo $(getos)) && echo "OS detected as: $OS"
scripts.setup:links: echo Create links for shared resources .. && lerna run --parallel setup-links
scripts.setup-start: echo Set up development system for first use ..
scripts.setup-create-log-folders: echo Create project folders .. && run-s -s -s setup-create-folders:*
scripts.setup-base: echo Bootstrap base modules .. && echo J1 Project Base modules: > install.log && npm i --silent lnk-cli shx npm-run-all cross-var cross-env -D >> install.log && echo done.
scripts.child-script: cross-env if-env BUNDLE_VENDORIZE=true && echo bundle vendorized || echo bundle global
